## PHATE Analysis and visualization of both objects( with and without subclustering of cluster 7)


```{r}
# Perform PHATE dimensionality reduction on the aligned_rat_merged_subcluster object using PCA embeddings
data_phate <- phate(aligned_rat_merged_subcluster@reductions$pca@cell.embeddings)

## stash the embeddings back into the seurat object as a dimension reduction object
aligned_rat_merged_subcluster[["PHATE"]] <- CreateDimReducObject(embeddings = data_phate$embedding, key = "PHATE_", assay = DefaultAssay(aligned_rat_merged_subcluster))

# Creat a PHATE embedding plot for the selected clusters
DimPlot(aligned_rat_merged_subcluster , reduction = "PHATE", label = T) + ggtitle(label = "PHATE")
```
